fields.Name: Enchantment: Devourer
fields.Description: +50% Attack Speed +30 Magic Damage on Hit Passive - Devouring Spirit: Takedowns on enemies increase the magic damage of this item: +1 for Champions or Large Monsters +2 for Rift Scuttlers +5 for Epic Monsters At 30 Stacks, your Devourer becomes Sated, granting extra on Hit effects.
